snippet: The attack in Maiduguri raised doubts about official claims that the insurgents, known as Boko Haram, had been pushed into remote areas.
abstract: Nigerian authorities impose a 24-hour curfew around Maidguri, northeastern region's main city, after Islamic militants stage an audacious attack aimed at a government air base; militants are suspected to be Boko Haram members.
lead_paragraph: The attack in Maiduguri raised doubts about official claims that the insurgents, known as Boko Haram, had been pushed into remote areas.

headline.main: Insurgents Strike in Major Nigerian City
